key_insights.title: Building Energy Consumption Increased 12.3% YoY
key_insights.description: Energy consumption increased significantly from 2018 to 2019 across all floors
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Implement energy efficiency measures targeting AC systems (highest consumers)
key_insights.business_impact: Annual cost increase of $45,000-60,000 if trend continues

key_insights.title: Floor 2 Consumes 2.8x More Energy Than Average
key_insights.description: Floor 2 shows extreme energy consumption compared to other floors
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Immediate audit of Floor 2 AC systems and equipment configuration
key_insights.business_impact: Potential savings of $25,000-35,000 annually with optimization

key_insights.title: 14 AC Units at Risk of Failure
key_insights.description: 14 AC units showing 15%+ performance degradation requiring immediate attention
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Schedule preventive maintenance for identified AC units within 30 days
key_insights.business_impact: Prevent $40,000-55,000 in emergency repairs and energy waste

key_insights.title: Sensor Network Achieving 94.7% Uptime
key_insights.description: Strong overall sensor network reliability with opportunities for improvement
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Focus maintenance on 8 underperforming sensors causing 60% of issues
key_insights.business_impact: Improving to 98% uptime saves $12,000 annually in monitoring gaps

key_insights.title: Daily Peak Energy Usage: 2-4 PM (340% Above Baseline)
key_insights.description: Extreme peak consumption pattern creating unnecessary demand charges
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Implement load balancing and staggered equipment scheduling
key_insights.business_impact: Potential 15-20% reduction in peak demand charges

key_insights.title: 23 Equipment Units Need Maintenance Within 90 Days
key_insights.description: Predictive analysis identifies equipment requiring proactive maintenance
key_insights.business_impact: Reduce unplanned downtime by 65% and maintenance costs by 30%

key_insights.title: Building Efficiency Score: 73/100
key_insights.description: Building operates at 73% efficiency with significant improvement potential
key_insights.actionable_recommendation: Focus on Floor 2 optimization and AC system upgrades
key_insights.business_impact: Reaching 85% efficiency saves $95,000 annually in operational costs

energy_recommendations.title: AC System Smart Controls
energy_recommendations.description: Install smart thermostats and zone controls

energy_recommendations.title: Floor 2 System Audit & Optimization
energy_recommendations.description: Comprehensive audit and optimization of Floor 2 systems

energy_recommendations.title: Load Balancing Implementation
energy_recommendations.description: Implement smart scheduling to reduce peak demand

energy_recommendations.title: LED Lighting Upgrade
energy_recommendations.description: Replace existing lighting with LED systems
